column1: https://homestars.com/on/solina/drain-services,6,https://homestars.com/on/solina/drain-services,Drain Services,2788949,http://www.aquatechwaterproofing.ca,/companies/2788949-aqua-tech-plumbing?searched_category_id=341&service_area=2216634,"Aqua Tech Waterproofing  is the most experienced and affordable privately owned company that offers basement  waterproofing,underpinning, basement lowering,concrete floors and drain services to families and businesses across the Greater Toronto Area. Based out of Toronto and operating over 20  trucks across GTA, we are conveniently located to service you in Oakville, Richmond Hill, Metro Toronto or Ajax.

With more than 25 years of experience our trained technicians offer a quality, reliable and stress free waterproofing service. You can count on it. In addition, our friendly and professional staff is here to answer any questions you may have about our company or our services.
Have an emergency? Don’t hesitate. Our 24 hour Emergency phone line is here to serve you better.

Clogged drains? Leaking taps? Clogged toilet? Repairs? and more? We have what you need at highly competitive prices you can afford. We will either match or even beat other estimates. At Aqua Tech Waterproofing and Drain, our goal is about doing the job right the first time around.
We use the most sophisticated technology combined with high knowledge of our services, which means the problem is fixed fast by a systems qualified plumber, leaving you worry free.
We look forward to hearing from you.

https://homestars.com/on/solina/drain-services,6,https://homestars.com/on/solina/drain-services,Drain Services,2910446,http://www.drainkingplumbers.ca,/companies/2910446-drain-king-plumbers?searched_category_id=341&service_area=2192728,"At Drain King Plumbers, every customers needs are important. Our promise is to focus on your satisfaction and provide you with the solution that best fits your needs.

Some of our Services include: Plumbing Repairs and Drain Service, Water Service Replacement, Building Drain Replacement, Video (Camera) Inspection of Drains/Sewers, High Pressure Water Jetting/Power Flushing, Trenchless Technology, Water Purification, Backwater Valve and Sump Pump, Waterproofing & Storm Drainage
Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke, Brampton, Mississauga, York Region, & Durham Region

Drain King Plumbers gets the job done right, the first time. Always on-time, we work quickly and efficiently to make the experience as painless as possible. You can always count of us 24/7! You never have to clean up after a Drain King Technician, we will leave the work area as clean, or cleaner!
Call the go-to plumbing experts at Drain King Now! 416-661-KING(5464)
Same Price, Any Time, Any Day: No suprises or unexpected bills. Our flat rate pricing means no additional charges on evenings, weekends, and holidays.
At Drain King Plumbers, we believe that providing quality service at reasonable flat-rate prices give Toronto homeowners the confidence they need to make the right choice.
Drain King Plumbers are experts at:
* Hydro-flushing/scrubbing/Jetting (high pressure water drain cleaning clears blockages and restores your pipe to near new condition)
* No Dig Trenchless Technology (remove those tree roots and replace broken clay pipes without the expense of digging up your yard)

Need a plumber in Toronto or Greater Toronto Area? Call us at 416-661-KING(5464). Trust the plumbing and drain company people rely on. Call Drain King Plumbers! your satisfaction is always guaranteed!

* Emergency Services: In a home plumbing emergency, you can count on Drain King Plumbers. With one simple phone call, you can significantly reduce stress and property damage that a sudden plumbing or drain issue can cause.

* Trenchless Pipe Repair: Call us before you decide to tear up your basement or landscaping! Our Trenchless methods could save you tens of thousands of dollars! We use quick, easy, reliable and permanent trenchless repair methods.

* Damaged Sewer Lines: Cracked sewer pipes are a common source of costly property damage and potentially serious health issues for homeowners. Not to worry, Drain King Plumbers is right around the corner!
* Water Heater Replace/Repair: Hot water is essential in your showers, bathtubs, kitchen sinks, dishwashers and washing machines.
* Water Softeners & Filters: With whole-house or under counter water softening/filtration equipment installed by Drain King, you know your water is safe.

* Sump Pump & Battery Backup Systems: A sump pump keeps your basement dry and mold free, but occasionally it can malfunction or become overwhelmed. Get a battery backup for peace of mind in the next heavy rainstorm.
* Clogged Toilet Repair: Does your toilet clog or overflow? Be sure to fix the clog before it becomes a serious problem that can cause water damage and mold.
* Clogged Shower Repair: Is your shower slow draining? Have no fear! Drain King is here!
* Clogged Drain Repair: Clogged drains rarely get better on their own. Dont wait until is becomes a bigger issue! Call Now! 416-661-KING(5464)
* Frozen Pipe/Drain Repair: Is water gushing out of your ceiling or wall? It could be a burst pipe! Call us right away - to make the problem go away!
Drain King Plumbers - where every customer gets the Royal Treatment!
